verses.verse: Then the heads <S%H7218><s%> of households of the Levites <S%H1><s%> approached <S%H3881><s%> Eleazar <S%H5066><s%> the priest <S%H499><s%> and Joshua <S%H3548><s%> the son <S%H3091><s%> of Nun <S%H1121><s%> and the heads <S%H5126><s%> of households of the tribes <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1><s%> of Israel. <S%H4294><s%>

And they spoke <S%H1696><s%> to them at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> us cities <S%H5892><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> in, with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> for our cattle. <S%H929><s%>"

So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> according <S%H413><s%> to the command <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites. <S%H6956><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who were of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> received <S%H1961><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the Simeonites <S%H8099><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

And the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> received ten <S%H6235><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> from the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> and from the half-tribe of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> received thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> from the families <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> and from the half-tribe of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> received twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are [here] mentioned <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon; <S%H8095><s%>

and they were for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> one of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites, <S%H6956><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> for the lot <S%H1486><s%> was theirs <S%H1992><s%> first. <S%H7223><s%>

Thus they gave <S%H5414><s%> them Kiriath-arba, [Arba being] the father of Anak <S%H1><s%> (that is, Hebron <S%H6061><s%>), in the hill <S%H2275><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah, <S%H2022><s%> with its surrounding <S%H3063><s%> pasture <S%H5439><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>

But the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> and its villages, <S%H9161><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> to Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> as his possession. <S%H272><s%>

So to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> and Libnah <S%H3841><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
and Jattir <S%H3492><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
and Holon <S%H2473><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Debir <S%H1688><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>

and Ain <S%H5871><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Juttah <S%H3194><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> [and] Beth-shemesh with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> from these <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Geba <S%H1387><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Almon <S%H5960><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>

Then the cities <S%H5892><s%> from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were allotted <S%H1486><s%> to the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [even to] the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath. <S%H6955><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> them Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Gezer <S%H1507><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
and Kibzaim <S%H6911><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Beth-horon with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan, <S%H1835><s%> Elteke <S%H514><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
Aijalon <S%H357><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Gath-rimmon with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> [they allotted] Taanach <S%H8590><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Gath-rimmon with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> for the families <S%H4940><s%> of the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were ten. <S%H6235><s%>

And to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> one of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> from the half-tribe of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> [they gave] Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> and Be-eshterah with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> [they gave] Mishal <S%H4861><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Abdon <S%H5658><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
Helkath <S%H2520><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Rehob <S%H7340><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> [they gave] Kedesh <S%H6943><s%> in Galilee, <S%H1551><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Hammoth-dor with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Kartan <S%H7178><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%> were thirteen <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>

And to the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [they gave] from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> Jokneam <S%H3362><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Kartah <S%H7177><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>
Dimnah <S%H1829><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Nahalal <S%H5096><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> [they gave] Bezer <S%H1221><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Jahaz <S%H3096><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>
Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Mephaath <S%H4158><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And from the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> [they gave] Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of refuge <S%H4733><s%> for the manslayer, <S%H7523><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands <S%H4054><s%> and Mahanaim <S%H4266><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%>

Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands, <S%H4054><s%> Jazer <S%H3270><s%> with its pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in all. <S%H3605><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> [these were] the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites; <S%H3881><s%> and their lot <S%H1486><s%> was twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were forty-eight cities <S%H5892><s%> with their pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands. <S%H4054><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> each <S%H5892><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> its surrounding <S%H5439><s%> pasture <S%H4054><s%> lands; <S%H4054><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> [it was] with all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities. <S%H5892><s%>

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to their fathers, and they possessed <S%H1><s%> it and lived <S%H3423><s%> in it.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5117><s%> them rest <S%H5117><s%> on every <S%H5439><s%> side, <S%H5439><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that He had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, and no <S%H1><s%> one <S%H3808><s%> of all <S%H376><s%> their enemies <S%H3605><s%> stood <S%H340><s%> before <S%H5975><s%> them; the Lord <S%H6440><s%> gave <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H5414><s%> their enemies <S%H3605><s%> into their hand. <S%H340><s%>

Not one <S%H1697><s%> of the good <S%H2896><s%> promises <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> failed; <S%H5307><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to pass. <S%H935><s%>
